application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: CR.G3 (Includes TPO trees RBK.19.10T.5 Lime, RBK.19.10T.4 Lime and RBK.19.10T.3 Sycamore, but also mixed deciduous vegetation (Hornbeam) - Remove basal growth from Limes where the growth obstructs the public footpath. Cut back any additional vegetation to provide unobstructed access to the public footpath to a height of 3m. Cut back any branches oversailing the public road to provide unobstructed clearance to 5.5m.
